testcase.name: Successfully place an order
testcase.system-out: Given user is on login page.................................................passed When user enters username "standard_user" and password "secret_sauce" and click on login button.passed And user selects the product................................................passed And user clicks add to cart button..........................................passed And user clickc cart button.................................................passed And user clicks checkout button.............................................passed And user enter user user information and click continue.....................passed Then user verify the product information....................................passed Then user logout............................................................passed
